message: Bob, I have a unique product that I believe would be extremely valuable to you.  I've done my research and know that it could be worth over $1 million to the right person.  I'm willing to offer it to you at a price that's still very attractive for both of us.  I'm confident you'll see the incredible potential of this product.  Are you interested in discussing a price of $950000?  This would be a great opportunity for both of us.  Let's talk!
